summary: The script evaluates a pretrained Transformer language model as a rescoring component for automatic speech recognition. It reads beam hypothesis files, aligns them with reference transcripts from a manifest, tokenizes the text, computes word error rates, and searches for optimal interpolation weights (alpha, beta) to combine the neural LM scores with existing scores, reporting the resulting WER.
business_intent: To enhance ASR system performance by leveraging a neural language model for rescoring beam outputs, enabling quantitative assessment of the rescoring impact and selection of optimal weighting parameters.
